attributes.additional_details: The Labour government has failed to uphold its promises, eroding public trust. Economic mismanagement and broken pledges necessitate action. We believe they lack a valid mandate. The people deserve an immediate general election. This petition demands Parliament's dissolution and a national vote, allowing the electorate to choose a government that reflects their needs.
attributes.background: Demand an immediate UK general election. Labour's broken promises and failures have eroded public trust. Their inability to deliver necessitates a fresh mandate. The British people deserve to choose their leadership now.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700143
